::Slaughter::

ld never be heard again.  Mech fluid, slime and saliva dripped and sprayed =
from Slaughter's mouth.  Slaughter finally decided to wolf down the rest of=
 Squawktalk.

 =

karact stumbled over into a wall and looks at the multiple images of Slaugh=
ter killing Squawktalk...

outhed BIRD-BRAIN!!!!"  Slaughter yelled.

            ::Slaughter::

owly going away, thanks to Shokaract's beast mode legs.  

                =
"I'm bored of you!!  Slaughter shall eat the BIRD!!!!" Slaughter yelled.

 =
